name: Vindicta:Ruined Destiny
description:
Trailer:

Vindicta: Ruined Destiny is a 2D platformer game in which the player is playing as a young boy belonging to a Haer-Dan village, whose father was killed. Join youthful hero on an expedition deep into the wilderness,  to recover the Ring of Control and to discover the reason why his father was killed. Fight with enemies, jump over the traps, and slide down the walls in this action-packed game.

Press A & D to Move Left and Right. Press Space to Jump.
Press Q to Block. LMB to attack.
Press F for a Ranged Attack.
Press G to Dash

press E to melle

MAJOR SPOILERS AHEAD
Your enemies drop their souls after being killed, which can be used later to buy more health in a shop. However every soul you sell affect the fight with a final boss making it harder to beat it .
It also changes the Ending. Our interpretation of other side of the coin was to show that every soul spent and every enemy killed will have not only positive but also negative aspects as well.
